trans-unit.source: Translates an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane.
trans-unit.target: 转换三维 x-y-z 平面中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> by which to offset the model.
trans-unit.target: 偏移模型时所使用的偏移量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> class, using the specified offset <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的偏移量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a new TranslateTransform3D.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录创建新 TranslateTransform3D。

trans-unit.source: To use the transformation, add it to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用转换，将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>来转换。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the X value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，该值指定用于指定平移偏移量的 Vector3D 的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Y value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，该值指定用于指定平移偏移量的 Vector3D 的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Z value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，该值指定用于指定平移偏移量的 Vector3D 的 Z 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> class using the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的偏移量初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置平移偏移量的 X 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the X-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，表示平移偏移量的 X 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt sets this property on a transform applied to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录设置此属性应用于转换上<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetX" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetX" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置平移偏移量的 Y 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the Y-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，表示平移偏移量的 Y 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt sets this property on a transform applied to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录设置此属性应用于转换上<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetY" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetY" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Z-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置平移偏移量的 Z 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the Z-axis value of the translation's offset.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，表示平移偏移量的 Z 轴值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt sets this property on a transform applied to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录设置此属性应用于转换上<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetZ" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetZ" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> that represents the value of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示平移值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> that represents the value of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示转换值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" />。
